main.name: Joe Hollier
main.description: This is my React software portfolio where I not only show you some of the projects I've create but also some things I am interested in.
main.bio: After several years of physically building anything from racecars to rocket engines, I became obsessed with building using software technologies â€“ I have the global pandemic lockdown to thank for this. I enjoyed building personal software projects so much that I pivoted my career towards using those same technologies to adress deviciencies at my current job.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: I was part of a small group of students who founded an auto racing engineering club to compete on a global scale. We designed, built, tested, and raced open-wheeled, formula style race cars. Check the team's webiste out

work.title: Software Development Engineer
work.description: Scripted a post test data pipline using Python, Pandas, and NumPy to store reduced trending data. Developed a React front end for easily viewing and exporting this trended data.
work.description2: I've been a developer for Blue's family of liquid oxygen / liquid hydrogen rocket engines. This includes full life-cycle deisgn of structural hardware, overall engine and test article layouts, material property development, and configuration managment.

work.title: Mechanical Engineer
work.description: Provided mechanical development support for design updates the Patriot Missile Defense System.

work.title: Mechanical Engineer
work.description: Developed mechanical systems for the area denial Supervised Smart Munition DoD initiative.

projects.title: MathPrepPro
projects.category: A deployed webapp for teaching highschool math through daily emails.

projects.title: Ikon Reservation Tool
projects.category: A tool for automating ski day reservations during COVID.

projects.title: Formula 1 Exploration
projects.category: An exploratory data science project to answer to interesting questions regarding Formula 1 racing data.

projects.title: ISS Viewing Angles
projects.category: A cool tool that will give you current viewing angles to the ISS at your current location.
